nodes.text: Level Three was a ranking number among students on the planet Naboo, presumably as part of the planet's education system.

Padmé Amidala, when staying at Varykino under the protection of then-Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker due to a threat against her life in 22 BBY, recalled that at Level Three, she and her fellow students often stayed at the area during school retreat, recalling that she and the others frequently swam to a nearby island.
